thread.title: Alleged Nigerian drug importer appears in court, remains behind bars
thread.title_full: Alleged Nigerian drug importer appears in court, remains behind bars

title: Alleged Nigerian drug importer appears in court, remains behind bars
text:
Alleged Nigerian drug importer appear... Alleged Nigerian drug importer appears in court, remains behind bars Next Story Prev Story 28 min ago Read more: The Age 
ACT Policing Drugs and Organised Crime team leader detective sergeant Bill Freeman explains how police seized 10 kilograms of methamphetamine A A A' worth about $10 million A A A' hidden inside a statue imported from China. A Nigerian man caught in an undercover sting that uncovered roughly $10 million worth of methamphetamine hidden inside a Chinese statue has appeared in court.   The Age.
